title: Chest does not exist?
body:
Greetings! It's my first time making a discussion. ( Or a complaint. )
I'm having problems with the Chest Opening system, if this is a bug or it is something I am not aware of.

https://gyazo.com/ee321f32ff3b4d4dfa7b248c0f0a04ba

It says I currently have 4 Chests available, when hovering above the chest icon.
I know for a fact all those four are Hextech Chests.
However if I go try to open the chests in my loot tab, this appears, having 0 chests?

https://gyazo.com/4047009ab984c8e0d9e061426c7cb962

I've been searching ways to solve this, unfortunately I haven't got a chance managing to find the exact problem.

Either it's a bug, or is it something I should be concern of?

Thank you in advance. (  If you manage to find the solution of course. :)  )

replies.body: The icon in the profile page is telling you that you can earn up to 4 chests if you or someone in your premade gets a S grade.  After you earn a chest then you will see it appear in your loot page.

Lew on point with the assist! He's spot on, and you'll be able to get those chests by having yourself or a premade earn an S- or above while using a champion you own. Those available chest slots will "regenerate" one by one starting 7 days from when you earned the first one!
